code: export const apps=[{id:"waze",name:"Waze",icon:"/assets/icons/waze.svg",color:"#33ccff",description:"Navegación GPS en tiempo real",category:"Navegación",command:"chromium-browser --kiosk --no-sandbox --disable-dev-shm-usage https://www.waze.com",type:"external",requiresNetwork:true},{id:"spotify",name:"Spotify",icon:"/assets/icons/spotify.svg",color:"#1DB954",description:"Streaming de música",category:"Entretenimiento",command:"spotify --no-zygote",type:"external",requiresNetwork:true},{id:"maps",name:"Maps",icon:"/assets/icons/maps.svg",color:"#4285F4",description:"Google Maps",category:"Navegación",command:"chromium-browser --kiosk --no-sandbox --disable-dev-shm-usage https://maps.google.com",type:"external",requiresNetwork:true},{id:"whatsapp",name:"WhatsApp",icon:"/assets/icons/whatsapp.svg",color:"#25D366",description:"Mensajería WhatsApp Web",category:"Comunicación",command:"chromium-browser --kiosk --no-sandbox --disable-dev-shm-usage https://web.whatsapp.com",type:"external",requiresNetwork:true},{id:"phone",name:"Teléfono",icon:"/assets/icons/phone.svg",color:"#34B7F1",description:"Gestión de llamadas",category:"Comunicación",command:"internal:phone",type:"internal",requiresNetwork:false},{id:"camera",name:"Cámara",icon:"/assets/icons/camera.svg",color:"#FF5E5B",description:"Acceso a cámara del vehículo",category:"Utilidades",command:"libcamera-hello --qt-preview",type:"hardware",requiresNetwork:false},{id:"settings",name:"Ajustes",icon:"/assets/icons/settings.svg",color:"#9E9E9E",description:"Configuración del sistema",category:"Sistema",command:"internal:settings",type:"internal",requiresNetwork:false},{id:"weather",name:"Clima",icon:"/assets/icons/weather.svg",color:"#FFCC33",description:"Información meteorológica",category:"Información",command:"chromium-browser --kiosk --no-sandbox --disable-dev-shm-usage https://weather.com",type:"external",requiresNetwork:true}];

sourcesContent:
export const apps = [
  {
    id: "waze",
    name: "Waze",
    icon: "/assets/icons/waze.svg",
    color: "#33ccff",
    description: "Navegación GPS en tiempo real",
    category: "Navegación",
    command: "chromium-browser --kiosk --no-sandbox --disable-dev-shm-usage https://www.waze.com",
    type: "external",
    requiresNetwork: true
  },
  {
    id: "spotify",
    name: "Spotify",
    icon: "/assets/icons/spotify.svg",
    color: "#1DB954",
    description: "Streaming de música",
    category: "Entretenimiento",
    command: "spotify --no-zygote",
    type: "external",
    requiresNetwork: true
  },
  {
    id: "maps",
    name: "Maps",
    icon: "/assets/icons/maps.svg",
    color: "#4285F4",
    description: "Google Maps",
    category: "Navegación",
    command: "chromium-browser --kiosk --no-sandbox --disable-dev-shm-usage https://maps.google.com",
    type: "external",
    requiresNetwork: true
  },
  {
    id: "whatsapp",
    name: "WhatsApp",
    icon: "/assets/icons/whatsapp.svg",
    color: "#25D366",
    description: "Mensajería WhatsApp Web",
    category: "Comunicación",
    command: "chromium-browser --kiosk --no-sandbox --disable-dev-shm-usage https://web.whatsapp.com",
    type: "external",
    requiresNetwork: true
  },
  {
    id: "phone",
    name: "Teléfono",
    icon: "/assets/icons/phone.svg",
    color: "#34B7F1",
    description: "Gestión de llamadas",
    category: "Comunicación",
    command: "internal:phone",
    type: "internal",
    requiresNetwork: false
  },
  {
    id: "camera",
    name: "Cámara",
    icon: "/assets/icons/camera.svg",
    color: "#FF5E5B",
    description: "Acceso a cámara del vehículo",
    category: "Utilidades",
    command: "libcamera-hello --qt-preview",
    type: "hardware",
    requiresNetwork: false
  },
  {
    id: "settings",
    name: "Ajustes",
    icon: "/assets/icons/settings.svg",
    color: "#9E9E9E",
    description: "Configuración del sistema",
    category: "Sistema",
    command: "internal:settings",
    type: "internal",
    requiresNetwork: false
  },
  {
    id: "weather",
    name: "Clima",
    icon: "/assets/icons/weather.svg",
    color: "#FFCC33",
    description: "Información meteorológica",
    category: "Información",
    command: "chromium-browser --kiosk --no-sandbox --disable-dev-shm-usage https://weather.com",
    type: "external",
    requiresNetwork: true
  }
];
